hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: Try using various items and weapons on me :)

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Bombs (20 pieces)# and #the Prelude of Light#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #4# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: Hi @, we've been trying to reach you about your horse's extended warranty.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #the Key#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Giant's Knife# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Prescription# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #Double Defense#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Strength Upgrade#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Bottom of the Well#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Blue Fire Bottle# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #Double Defense#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# can be found at #Zora's River#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #a Red Rupee# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path of time.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Field# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #riding the bean in Lake Hylia# leads to...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Deku Stick#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #2# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Strength Upgrade#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Sun's Song# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Mask of Truth# yields #a Heart Container#.
